item.title: Seven & i 因报道 KKR 有意收购超市而上涨 2.2
item.description: 据报道，KKR & Co.正在考虑对约克控股公司（York Holdings）进行投资，约克控股公司是一家经营超市、餐馆和其他资产的伞式公司，可能会从Seven & i.中分拆出来，之后，Seven & i Holdings Co.的股价最高上涨了2.2%。【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co.’s shares rose as much as 2.2% after a report that KKR & Co. is considering an investment in York Holdings, an umbrella company for supermarkets, restaurants and other assets may be split from the Seven & i.】

item.title: 新西兰央行在第二次降息半点后发出放缓宽松政策的信号
item.description: 新西兰中央银行在连续第二次会议上将利率下调了半个百分点，但预示未来宽松步伐将放缓，预计通胀将加快。当地美元跳涨。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank cut interest rates by half a percentage point for a second straight meeting but signaled a slower pace of easing ahead, with inflation projected to quicken. The local dollar jumped.】

item.title: 三星提升芯片部门主管，准备卷土重来
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）在其芯片业务主管上任仅六个月后就赋予其更多职责，这表明该公司决心在人工智能市场上追赶 SK 海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc.【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. granted more responsibility to its chip business head just six months after the executive took the helm, a signal of the company’s resolve to catch SK Hynix Inc. in the AI market.】

item.title: Hello Kitty 股价因股票出售计划创 2014 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: Hello Kitty 品牌所有者三丽鸥公司表示，包括总裁在内的持有人将在公开市场上出售股票，三丽鸥公司股价创下 2014 年 5 月以来最大跌幅。【原文：Sanrio Co. shares tumbled the most since May 2014 after the brand owner of Hello Kitty said holders including its president will sell shares in the open market.】

item.title: 越南大亨被要求退还失踪的数十亿美元以挽救她的生命
item.description: 越南检察官告诉地产大亨张美兰，如果她想避免被注射死刑，就必须偿还约 110 亿美元。【原文：Vietnamese prosecutors have told property tycoon Truong My Lan she must repay an estimated $11 billion if she wants to avoid execution by lethal injection.】

item.title: 美国法院撤销对与朝鲜黑客攻击有关的加密货币交易商的制裁
item.description: 一家联邦上诉法院裁定，在一个朝鲜黑客组织利用 Tornado Cash 软件洗钱超过 4.55 亿美元后，美国财政部越权制裁了加密货币混合器 Tornado Cash。【原文：A federal appeals court ruled the US Treasury Department overstepped its authority by sanctioning cryptocurrency mixer Tornado Cash after a North Korea hacking group used the software to launder more than $455 million.】

item.title: 从大亨手中没收的香港塔最终卖给了一所大学
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港城市大学已签署协议，购买中国移动香港公司曾寻求购买的位于香港的一处不良商业物业。【原文：Hong Kong Metropolitan University has signed an agreement to buy a distressed commercial property in the city that China Mobile Hong Kong had sought to purchase, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费物价指数低于预期，澳大利亚央行将按兵不动
item.description: 由于政府退税帮助降低了电费和租金等主要价格驱动因素，澳大利亚 10 月份的通胀率低于预期。【原文：A gauge of Australian inflation came in below forecast in October as government rebates helped pull down key price drivers such as electricity and rental costs.】

item.title: 停火协议达成后黄金保持稳定，交易商关注美国数据
item.description: 中东停火协议削弱了避险需求，投资者等待美国经济数据为美联储的利率路径提供线索，因此黄金走势平稳。【原文：Gold was steady as a cease-fire deal in the Middle East sapped haven demand, and investors waited for US economic data that will provide clues on the Federal Reserve’s rate path.】

item.title: 英国博彩运营商面临 1 亿英镑的税收，以促进减少危害
item.description: 英国的博彩运营商面临着对某些类型的游戏征收高达利润 1.1% 的税款，因为政府正在寻求每年 1 亿英镑（1.26 亿美元）的资金投入到减少危害和研究中。【原文：Gambling operators in the UK face a tax of as much as 1.1% of profits on some types of games as the government seeks £100 million ($126 million) a year to invest in harm reduction and research.】

item.title: 软银支持的 Alto 通过可转换债券融资 4000 万美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，位于旧金山的数字制药初创公司 Alto Pharmacy 已以可转换票据的形式从投资者手中筹集了至少 4000 万美元。【原文：Alto Pharmacy, a digital pharmaceutical startup based in San Francisco, has raised at least $40 million from investors in the form of a convertible note, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧佩克+可能推迟达成停火协议，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 石油价格持稳，原因是美国库存预计将下降，以及有迹象表明欧佩克+将再次推迟恢复部分产量，从而抵消了以色列与真主党达成停火协议后地缘政治风险缓解的影响。【原文：Oil was steady as a forecast drop in US stockpiles and signs OPEC+ will once again delay restoring some output countered easing geopolitical risk after a cease-fire agreement between Israel and Hezbollah.】

item.title: 中国企业债务状况适时降低人民币风险
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第二任总统任期内，人民币面临越来越多的不确定性，中国企业的外币债务负担大幅缩减，减少了一个关键的脆弱性来源。【原文：Chinese companies’ foreign-currency debt load has shrunk significantly, reducing a key source of vulnerability as the yuan faces growing uncertainties under Donald Trump’s second presidency.】

item.title: 特朗普以关税威胁预示全球权力殿堂的不安
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）只在社交媒体上发了一个帖子，世界各国领导人就开始进入应对模式，美国汽车制造商股票暴跌，投资者开始争先恐后地评估潜在的经济影响。【原文：All it took was a single social media post by Donald Trump for world leaders to plunge into response mode, US automaker stocks to tumble and investors to begin scrambling to assess potential economic impact.】

item.title: 零售热情降温，中国股市反弹面临风险
item.description: 据分析师称，散户投资者正在从中国的交易所交易基金中套现，如果中国政府不能提振市场情绪，市场将面临进一步波动的风险。【原文：Retail investors are cashing out from China’s exchange-traded funds, risking further market volatility if Beijing fails to boost sentiment, according to analysts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚社交媒体禁令即将投票，尽管立法者对此表示担忧
item.description: 澳大利亚禁止 16 岁以下儿童使用社交媒体的计划在参议院经过简短调查签字后，有望在几天内获得议会通过，尽管来自不同政治派别的立法者对法案的 "仓促 "性质表示不满。【原文：Australia’s plan to ban social media for children under the age of 16 is expected to pass parliament within days after it was signed off in a truncated Senate inquiry, even as lawmakers from across the political divide expressed discomfort at the “rushed” nature of the bills.】

item.title: 美国取消关税，亚洲股市动荡不安：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘时涨跌不一，此前投资者对唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划不屑一顾，使美国基准股市再创新高。美国总统拜登表示，以色列和真主党达成了停火协议。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set for a mixed open after investors looked past Donald Trump’s tariff plan to lift the US benchmark to yet another record. President Joe Biden said Israel and Hezbollah reached a cease-fire agreement.】

item.title: 韩国希望在 2025 年为芯片制造商提供 100 亿美元支持
item.description: 韩国计划明年加强对国内芯片制造商的财政支持，以巩固这个可能面临特朗普新政府不利政策和中国竞争对手更激烈挑战的产业。【原文：South Korea plans to bolster its fiscal support for domestic chipmakers next year, shoring up an industry that may face unfavorable policies from the incoming Trump administration and more intense challenges from Chinese rivals.】

item.title: 数据修正显示新西兰三月份国内生产总值增速加快
item.description: 根据国民账户的修订数据，截至 2024 年 3 月的一年中，新西兰的经济增长大大超过了之前的报告。【原文：New Zealand’s economy grew significantly more than previously reported in the year through March 2024, according to revised data drawn from the national accounts.】

item.title: 对冲基金 RTW 因在 Masimo 代理权争夺战中扮演角色而遭美国证券交易委员会调查
item.description: RTW 投资公司（RTW Investments）是一家价值 65 亿美元的对冲基金，专门从事生命科学领域的投资，该公司正在接受美国证券交易委员会的调查，原因是该公司参与了 Masimo 公司的代理权争夺战。【原文：RTW Investments, a $6.5 billion hedge fund specializing in the life sciences, is being investigated by the Securities and Exchange Commission over the firm’s involvement in a proxy fight at Masimo Corp.】

item.title: 英国央行伦巴第利称下次降息前需要更多证据
item.description: 英国央行副行长克莱尔-隆巴代利（Clare Lombardelli）表示，在她支持再次降息之前，她需要看到更多物价压力降温的证据。【原文：Bank of England Deputy Governor Clare Lombardelli said she needs to see more evidence of cooling price pressures before she backs another interest rate cut.】

item.title: 社交媒体巨头抨击拟议禁令
item.description: 早上好，我是悉尼的乔治。今日必读：- 科技巨头抨击 16 岁以下青少年社交媒体禁令- 麦格理被英国罚款- 特朗普对墨西哥、加拿大和中国的关税威胁【原文：Good morning, it’s Georgie here in Sydney. Here’s all the news you need to start your day.Today’s must-reads:• Tech giants slam under-16 social media ban• Macquarie fined by UK• Trump’s tariff threat on Mexico, Canada and China】

item.title: 谷歌和 OpenAI 尚未找到标记人工智能内容的 "银弹
item.description:
行业领导者致力于完善可识别合成文本的 "水印" 技术

。【原文：

Industry leaders work to perfect ‘watermarking’ technology that identifies synthetically generated text

】

item.title: 期权交易商押注国债市场将在数周内大幅下挫
item.description: 利率期权市场的看跌基调正在形成，这表明债券交易商正在为未来几周国债收益率再次飙升做好准备。【原文：A bearish tone is taking hold in the market for interest-rate options, suggesting that bond traders are bracing for Treasury yields to surge anew in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 巴拿马债务评级被 S&P 下调至最低投资等级
item.description: 巴拿马的信用评分被 S&P 全球评级公司下调，使这个中美洲国家离失去投资级地位又近了一步。【原文：Panama’s credit score was cut by S&P Global Ratings, putting the Central American nation a step closer to losing its investment-grade status.】

item.title: 个人电脑市场复苏缓慢，惠普利润前景黯淡
item.description: 惠普公司对本季度利润的展望低于预期，表明个人电脑市场从长达数年的低迷中复苏的步伐受挫。【原文：HP Inc. gave an outlook for profit in the current quarter that fell short of estimates, suggesting a setback in the personal computer market’s recovery from a yearslong slump.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 发布令人失望的盈利展望后股价下跌
item.description: 网络安全软件公司 CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. 发布的第四季度盈利预期低于投资者预期，该公司股价在尾盘下跌。【原文：CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. shares fell in late trading after the cybersecurity software firm issued a fourth-quarter earnings forecast that fell short of investors’ expectations.】

item.title: 私募股权投资支持的美国首次公开募股将在市场复苏中激增
item.description: 私募股权支持的首次公开募股有望在美国交易所卷土重来。【原文：Private equity-backed initial public offerings on US exchanges are poised for a comeback.】

item.title: 个人电脑市场受挫，戴尔销售额不及预期
item.description: 戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc.【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. reported worse-than-expected sales after a budding revival in the personal computer market stalled out.】

item.title: 可能冲破印尼男孩俱乐部的女人
item.description:
在东南亚最大的经济体中，政治往往是男性主导的家族事务。改变可能来自东爪哇。【原文：

Politics is often a male-dominated family affair in Southeast Asia’s largest economy. Change may come from East Java.

】
